select a.houseinfo_id, a.aptName, b.sidoName, b.gugunName, a.dongName, a.dongCode, a.buildYear, a.jibun, a.lat, a.lng from houseinfo as a inner join dongcode as b on a.dongCode = b.dongCode
select * from housedeal where aptCode = #{house_id} order by dealYear desc, dealMonth desc, dealDay desc;
